title: The Origin of "Oz"?
content:
Hey guys n gals...

I got this font "Oz" from a friend who wanted me to see it and I absolutely love it. But I can't seem to find the origin of the font and and therefore are not able to buy it.

Can anyone helo me and is there anyone here who is NOT in love with Oz? ;o)

Thanks

Mark

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150105012656im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Oz_font_4210.jpg)
author: TheMark
